Title: Authorizes certain police officers to receive certain service credit under sections 384 and 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Jonathan Roman, David Arroyo, and Vincent Fiumara to receive certain service credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law; authorizes Jason Behar to receive certain service credit under section 384 of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize certain police officers to receive certain service credit under sections 384 and 384-d of the retirement and social security law
